entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
